name: open-livestreamer
title: Open Livestreamer
description: open livestreamer directly from the browser when on twitch, hitbox or youtube
author: issue

preferences.name: quality
preferences.title: Stream quality
preferences.description: Change the quality of the stream, options are low, medium, best

preferences.name: optargs
preferences.title: Optional arguments for livestreamer
preferences.description: You can pass livestreamer options here in the form of --foo=bar,--baz=foo. Check livestreamer -h for what is available

preferences.name: qualityselector
preferences.title: Quality selection menu
preferences.description: Display a quality seleciton window everytime livestreamer is launched.
